price: 54. Que vous révéliez quelque chose au grand jour ou que vous le gardiez secret, Allah Sait parfaitement Toute chose.
arabic: إِن تُبۡدُواْ شَيۡـًٔا أَوۡ تُخۡفُوهُ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: in tub'dū shayan aw tukh'fūhu fa-inna al-laha kāna bikulli shayin ʿalīman
